summary: This is a JPMorgan Chase Bank Asset Account Portfolio statement for Jeffrey Epstein covering September 1-30, 2002. It details account holdings, transactions, and significant wire transfers, including a $5 million transfer to Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Primary holder of the JPMorgan Private Bank account detailed in this financial statement.

persons.name: Riley I. Hornbecker
persons.context: Listed as the account officer/service specialist for Jeffrey Epstein's JPMorgan account.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Listed as the contact at Financial Trust Company for the account, under the attention line.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Recipient of a $5,000,000 wire transfer from Jeffrey Epstein's account on September 18, 2002.

connections.description: Epstein initiated a $5 million wire transfer to Maxwell's account at Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co.
Hornbecker is listed as the JPMorgan account officer/service specialist for Epstein's account.

events.title: $2M Wire Transfer to Epstein's Palm Beach Account
events.description: A $2,000,000 sale from a money market fund and subsequent wire transfer to Jeffrey Epstein's account at Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co.

events.title: $1M Wire Transfer to Epstein's Palm Beach Account
events.description: A $1,000,000 sale from a money market fund and subsequent wire transfer to Jeffrey Epstein's account at Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co.

events.title: $5M Wire Transfer to Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A $5,000,000 sale from a money market fund and subsequent wire transfer to Ghislaine Maxwell's account at Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, New York, NY 10154-1002 (JPMorgan Chase Bank address)
Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co. (Financial institution receiving wire transfers)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's JPMorgan account held over $14.8 million in cash and short-term assets as of September 30, 2002.
On September 18, 2002, a $5 million wire transfer was sent from Epstein's account to an account for Ghislaine Maxwell at Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co.
The document shows significant liquidity management, with multiple multi-million dollar transactions (sales and wire transfers) occurring within the month.
The account was managed through JPMorgan's Private Bank, indicating high-net-worth status and personalized service.
